credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: counted cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Two verses, "Live to die," and "The Desire" separated by a reversing floral band and two birds.  A fleur de Lys in each corner.  Border of reversing strawberries.  Signed "Mary Hall 1786."
name: Sampler
